===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A clear, reddish-brown liquid used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to promote blood circulation and remove blood stasis, to relieve swelling and ''dispel mass'', to ''cool blood'' and staunch bleeding in the treatment of bleeding due to blood-heat, ecchymosis, and thrombocytopenic purpura". It is a herb mixture prepared from Motherwort or Herba Leonuri ([[益母草]]).
